name: Darius Cozmic Collection: Special Edition
overview: Darius Cozmic Collection is a compilation of M2 emulations of Darius, Darius II/Sagaia, and Darius Gaiden arcade titles. The Special Edition comes with additional console emulations of Darius Alpha, Darius Twin, Darius Force, Sagaia, and Darius II that are not available on the normal cart or through DLC.
